name: You’ll Be Mine
content: 我无法否认 这感觉就在我脑海中萦绕
让我无法躲避 直面一切
The way you look at me
The way you make me feel
所有的一切都那么虚幻
The way you touched my hand
I'll take it as a sign
And I know and I know
我知道 我心中明了
于我们而言 是否存在捷径可走
只因大千世界 爱情并非一成不变
The way you look at me
Your smile has made me blind
你的绚烂微笑 让我晕头转向
Yes I dreamed that you'll be mine
Do we have a fair chance
我们能否有携手前行的机会
The way you look at me
The way you make me feel
所有的一切都那么虚幻
You could bend the heart of steel
你可以融化我那钢铁之心
The way you touched my hand
I'll take it as a sign
And I know that you'll be mine
Yes I feel that you'll be mine
我能感觉到你将属于我
Is it just a dream of mine
这是否只是我的一场梦
